name: My First Game 2
description:
Hello everybody)

Your attention is the second part of the game "My First Game"

Character control: WASD

Shooting: Left Mouse Button

You have to shoot back from crowds of enemies who are hunting you (they just run in a straight line)

What's new in the second part of the game:

-You start the game with 1 life and have 25 patrons.

-The first aid kits and cartridges that you pick up give you +1 to your parameters.

-Enemies now drop coins for which you can pump your number of lives, as well as increase the number of first-aid kits and cartridges.

-System of pumping.

-A new green enemy has appeared that can shoot at you.

-The blue enemy has a knife with which he deals damage to you.

-The blue enemy has 5 life and 3 damage.

-Green enemy has 8 life and 5 damage.

At the start, the game turned out to be hardcore, but then it becomes easier)

Thanks for stopping by, and I'm off to work on part 3 of the game)

Special thanks: samuelbromley for his huge contribution to my development)

And also do not forget to subscribe to me to follow my projects)

Go to patreon to follow all the updates, as well as you contribute to the development of new content)
